Text: So can we by any chance get some instructions in what order to do what with which files? I've managed to get the game running, but first 10sec or so is just a black screen and after that I get to the intro (i think) but no matter buttons I press nothing happens. Help appriciated.

Extract Iso
Mount and Install
Extract Automated patch folder into Stein root directory
Run autopatch.bat, option A
This is useless. I suffer the same consequences as 43r0x, and Fulyen's explanation doesn't help at all, unfortunately.
